. All of these genetic changes prevent the production of forkhead box G1 or impair the protein's function. A shortage of functional forkhead box G1 disrupts normal brain development starting before birth, which appears to underlie the structural brain abnormalities and severe developmental problems characteristic of FOXG1 syndrome.",GHR,FOXG1 syndrome
Is FOXG1 syndrome inherited ?,"FOXG1 syndrome is considered an autosomal dominant condition, which means one copy of the altered gene in each cell
